field.name: BSR
field.description: Base clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: APBC0
field.description: APB0 bus clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: APBC1
field.description: APB1 bus clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: APBC2
field.description: APB2 bus clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: SWDS
field.description: Software watchdog clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: TTC
field.description: Trace clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: SOWT
field.description: Sub clock stabilization wait time setup bit

field.name: MOWT
field.description: Main clock stabilization wait time setup bit

register.name: PSW_TMR
register.description: PLL Clock Stabilization Wait Time Setup Register

field.name: POWT
field.description: PLL clock stabilization wait time setup bit

field.name: PLLK
field.description: PLL input clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: PLLM
field.description: PLL VCO clock frequency division ratio setting bit

field.name: PLLN
field.description: PLL feedback frequency division ratio setting bit

register.name: DBWDT_CTL
register.description: Debug Break Watchdog Timer Control Register

field.name: FCSE
field.description: Anomalous frequency detection interrupt enable bit

field.name: PCSE
field.description: PLL oscillation stabilization completion interrupt enable bit

field.name: SCSE
field.description: Sub oscillation stabilization completion interrupt enable bit

field.name: MCSE
field.description: Main oscillation stabilization completion interrupt enable bit

field.name: FCSI
field.description: Anomalous frequency detection interrupt status bit

field.name: PCSI
field.description: PLL oscillation stabilization completion interrupt status bit

field.name: SCSI
field.description: Sub oscillation stabilization completion interrupt status bit

field.name: MCSI
field.description: Main oscillation stabilization completion interrupt status bit

field.name: FCSC
field.description: Anomalous frequency detection interrupt cause clear bit

field.name: PCSC
field.description: PLL oscillation stabilization completion interrupt cause clear bit

field.name: SCSC
field.description: Sub oscillation stabilization completion interrupt cause clear bit

field.name: MCSC
field.description: Main oscillation stabilization completion interrupt cause clear bit

field.name: FCSR
field.description: Flag for anomalous frequency detection reset

field.name: KEY
field.description: Standby mode control write control bit

register.name: MCR_PSR
register.description: High-speed CR oscillation Frequency Division Setup Register

field.name: CSR
field.description: High-speed CR oscillation frequency division ratio setting bits

register.name: MCR_FTRM
register.description: High-speed CR oscillation Frequency Trimming Register

register.name: MCR_RLR
register.description: High-Speed CR Oscillation Register Write-Protect Register

field.name: RESEN
field.description: Reset enable bit of the software watchdog

field.name: INTEN
field.description: Interrupt and counter enable bit of the software watchdog

register.name: WDOGRIS
register.description: Software Watchdog Timer Interrupt Status Register

field.name: INTEN
field.description: Hardware watchdog interrupt and counter enable bit

register.name: WDG_RIS
register.description: Hardware Watchdog Timer Interrupt Status Register

field.name: ICRE
field.description: "Generates interrupt when ""1"" is set to TCSA.ICLR"

field.name: IRQZE
field.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to TCSA.IRQZF"

field.name: ECKE
field.description: Uses an external input clock (FRCK) as FRT's count clock

field.name: AD2E
field.description: Outputs AD conversion start signal to ADCunit2 upon Zero value detection by FRT

field.name: AD1E
field.description: Outputs AD conversion start signal to ADCunit1 upon Zero value detection by FRT

field.name: AD0E
field.description: Outputs AD conversion start signal to ADCunit0 upon Zero value detection by FRT

field.name: FSO0
field.description: Connects FRT ch.x to OCU ch.0

field.name: FSO1
field.description: Connects FRT ch.x to OCU ch.1

field.name: CST0
field.description: Enables the operation of OCU ch.(0)

field.name: CST1
field.description: Enables the operation of OCU ch.(1)

field.name: BDIS0
field.description: Disables the buffer function of the OCCP(0) register

field.name: BDIS1
field.description: Disables the buffer function of the OCCP(1) register

field.name: IOE0
field.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to OCSA.IOP0"

field.name: IOE1
field.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to OCSA.IOP1"

field.name: IOP0
field.description: Indicates that a match has already been detected between FRT's count value and OCCP(0) value at OCU ch.(0).

field.name: IOP1
field.description: Indicates that a match has already been detected between FRT's count value and OCCP(1) value at OCU ch.(1).

field.name: OTD0
field.description: Indicates that the RT(0) output pin is in the High-level output state.

field.name: OTD1
field.description: Indicates that the RT(1) output pin is in the High-level output state.

field.name: CMOD
field.description: selects OCU's operation mode in combination with OCSC.MOD0 to MOD5

field.name: BTS0
field.description: Performs buffer transfer of the OCCP(0) register upon Peak value detection by FRT

field.name: BTS1
field.description: Performs buffer transfer of the OCCP(1) register upon Peak value detection by FRT

field.name: MOD0
field.description: OCSC.MOD0 and OCSC.MOD1 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.0/ch.1 in combination with OCSB10.CMOD

field.name: MOD1
field.description: OCSC.MOD0 and OCSC.MOD1 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.0/ch.1 in combination with OCSB10.CMOD

field.name: MOD2
field.description: OCSC.MOD2 and OCSC.MOD3 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.2/ch.3 in combination with OCSB32.CMOD

field.name: MOD3
field.description: OCSC.MOD2 and OCSC.MOD3 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.2/ch.3 in combination with OCSB32.CMOD

field.name: MOD4
field.description: OCSC.MOD4 and OCSC.MOD5 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.4/ch.5 in combination with OCSB54.CMOD

field.name: MOD5
field.description: OCSC.MOD4 and OCSC.MOD5 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.4/ch.5 in combination with OCSB54.CMOD

register.name: OCU_OCCP0
register.description: OCU ch.0 Compare Value Store Register

register.name: OCU_OCCP1
register.description: OCU ch.1 Compare Value Store Register

register.name: OCU_OCCP2
register.description: OCU ch.2 Compare Value Store Register

register.name: OCU_OCCP3
register.description: OCU ch.3 Compare Value Store Register

register.name: OCU_OCCP4
register.description: OCU ch.4 Compare Value Store Register

register.name: OCU_OCCP5
register.description: OCU ch.5 Compare Value Store Register

field.name: DCK
field.description: clock cycle of the WFG timer

field.name: GTEN
field.description: the CH_GATE signal for each channel of WFG

field.name: PSEL
field.description: the PPG timer unit to be used at each channel of WFG

field.name: PGEN
field.description: specifies how to reflect the CH_PPG signal that is input to each channel of WFG on WFG output

field.name: DMOD
field.description: specifies which polarity will be used to output the non-overlap signal

field.name: NWS
field.description: noise-canceling width of the noise-canceller for the DTTIX pin

field.name: DTIF
field.description: Indicates that DTIF interrupt has been generated.

field.name: DTIC
field.description: Clears WFIR.DTIF and deasserts the DTIF interrupt signal.

field.name: TMIF10
field.description: Indicates that WFG10 timer interrupt has been generated.

field.name: TMIC10
field.description: Clears WFIR.TMIF10 and deasserts the WFG10 timer interrupt signal.

field.name: TMIF32
field.description: Indicates that WFG32 timer interrupt has been generated.

field.name: TMIC32
field.description: Clears WFIR.TMIF32 and deasserts the WFG32 timer interrupt signal.

field.name: TMIF54
field.description: Indicates that WFG54 timer interrupt has been generated.

field.name: TMIC54
field.description: Clears WFIR.TMIF54 and deasserts the WFG54 timer interrupt signal.

field.name: FSI0
field.description: Connects FRT ch.x to ICU ch.(0)

field.name: FSI1
field.description: Connects FRT ch.x to ICU ch.(1)

field.name: EG0
field.description: enables/disables the operation of ICU-ch.(0) and selects a valid edge(s)

field.name: EG1
field.description: enables/disables the operation of ICU-ch.(1) and selects a valid edge(s)

field.name: ICE0
field.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to ICSA.ICP0."

field.name: ICE1
field.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to ICSA.ICP1."

field.name: ICP0
field.description: Indicates that a valid edge has been detected at ICU ch.(0) and the capture operation has been performed

field.name: ICP1
field.description: Indicates that a valid edge has been detected at ICU ch.(1) and the capture operation has been performed

field.name: IEI0
field.description: indicates the latest valid edge of ICU-ch.(0)

field.name: IEI1
field.description: indicates the latest valid edge of ICU-ch.(1)

register.name: ICU_ICCP0
register.description: ICU ch.0 Capture value store register

register.name: ICU_ICCP1
register.description: ICU ch.1 Capture value store register

register.name: ICU_ICCP2
register.description: ICU ch.2 Capture value store register

register.name: ICU_ICCP3
register.description: ICU ch.3 Capture value store register

field.name: CE0
field.description: enable or disable the operation of ADCMP-ch.0 and select the FRT to be connected

field.name: CE1
field.description: enable or disable the operation of ADCMP-ch.1 and select the FRT to be connected

field.name: CE2
field.description: enable or disable the operation of ADCMP-ch.2 and select the FRT to be connected

field.name: SEL0
field.description: which count state FRT should be in to instruct AD conversion to be started at ADCMP-ch.0

field.name: SEL1
field.description: which count state FRT should be in to instruct AD conversion to be started at ADCMP-ch.1

field.name: SEL2
field.description: which count state FRT should be in to instruct AD conversion to be started at ADCMP-ch.2

field.name: BDIS0
field.description: Disables the buffer function of the ACCP0 and ACCPDN0 registers

field.name: BDIS1
field.description: Disables the buffer function of the ACCP1 and ACCPDN1 registers

field.name: BDIS2
field.description: Disables the buffer function of the ACCP2 and ACCPDN2 registers

field.name: BTS0
field.description: Performs buffer transfer of the ACCP0 and ACCPDN0 registers upon Peak value detection by FRT

field.name: BTS1
field.description: Performs buffer transfer of the ACCP1 and ACCPDN1 registers upon Peak value detection by FRT

field.name: BTS2
field.description: Performs buffer transfer of the ACCP2 and ACCPDN2 registers upon Peak value detection by FRT
